snippet: BUTWIN--Lawrence, suddenly and tragically on February 29, 2016. Our hearts go out in sympathy to Joan and the entire Butwin family, whose friendship, with affection and love, we have adored for four generations. The Tolkin Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: BUTWIN--Lawrence, suddenly and tragically on February 29, 2016. Our hearts go out in sympathy to Joan and the entire Butwin family, whose friendship, with affection and love, we have adored for four generations. The Tolkin Family 1/3
